| History                 = After the apparent death of [[Zheng Zu (Earth-616)|Fu Manchu]], the '''Wild Tiger Mob''' along with three other [[Triads (Earth-616)|Triads]] divided up Fu Manchu's criminal empire according to the [[MI6 (Earth-616)|MI6]].{{r|X-Men Vol 2 62}} The Wild Tiger Mob along with other major Triads came under the rule of the [[Zheng Bao Yu (Earth-616)|Cursed Lotus]] when she united Hong Kong's underworld.{{r|Journey into Mystery Vol 1 514}} 

They were involved in the production, trafficking, and sale of the "[[Wild Tiger (Drug)|Wild Tiger]]" drug, and acted as their leader [[Deng Ling-Xiao (Earth-616)|Wild Tiger]] acted as her emissary in [[Hong Kong]].{{r|Journey into Mystery Vol 1 515}} The production of the drug "Wild Tiger" was stopped by [[Shang-Chi (Earth-616)|Shang-Chi]].{{r|Journey into Mystery Vol 1 516}}
